title.pc:
A child who struggled to make a fist, 
improved after just 5 sessions, 20 minutes a day
title.mobile:
A child who struggled to make a fist, 
improved after just 5 sessions, 20 minutes a day

description.pc:
"My child's numb pinky worried me, but now I'm overjoyed!"
 Repeating 400+ movements during gameplay restored nerve connection, and fist-clenching became possible in 5 sessions.
description.mobile:
"My child's numb pinky worried me, but now I'm overjoyed!"
 Repeating 400+ movements during gameplay restored nerve connection, and fist-clenching became possible in 5 sessions.

title.pc:
A child who struggled to lift their wrist due to paralysis, 
 improved wrist mobility after just one session
title.mobile:
A child who struggled to lift their wrist due to paralysis, 
 improved wrist mobility after just one session

description.pc: The game dramatically increases wrist movement practice. By enabling self-guided proper movements, wrist lifting improved after just one session.
description.mobile: The game dramatically increases wrist movement practice. By enabling self-guided proper movements, wrist lifting improved after just one session.

review.title:
Check out the reviews from parents 
 who experienced real changes

review1.content: I was worried about when my child's numbness in their left pinky would improve, but I'm overjoyed to see immediate results with GemGem400!
review1.author: Kwon Oh-seong

review2.content: The long-lasting numbness was instantly relieved - the therapist and I shouted 'Amazing!' Busy with therapy visits? Still, I highly recommend this!
review2.author: Jinhee Lim

review3.content: After 2 months of GemGem400, my child's arms are more flexible. Movements that were impossible before are now possible!
review3.author: Eunseo Park

review4.content: While using GemGem400, my child's siblings join in because it looks fun - it's become a joyful family activity!
review4.author: Seonyoung Park

review5.content: I love that the story keeps them engaged, and they can exercise their muscles anywhere - at home or traveling - without visiting the therapy center.
review5.author: Kim Ji-an

review6.content: I used to help stretch my child's arms; after playing the game a few times, I could feel them loosening up right away.
review6.author: Heeyoung Kim

review7.content: At first, my child struggled with painful arm rotations, but thanks to GemGem400, I'm so happy to see their movements becoming smoother day by day!
review7.author: Mirae Jeong

review8.content: The therapist customized the game level based on my child's development stage - these detailed adjustments were especially helpful.
review8.author: Yejin Lee

review9.content: With three kids to care for, I felt guilty about not helping with rehab at home after therapy. GemGem400 solved this problem!
review9.author: Nayoung Kwon

review10.content: The app was so easy to use - just download and start! My child was so interested, they volunteered to try it on their own.
review10.author: Minho Choi

review11.content: While playing GemGem400, my child especially loves achieving goals and earning items in the game.
review11.author: Jihye Park

review12.content: My child rarely used their hands, but with GemGem400, they're moving them consistently every day - I'm so happy about this!
review12.author: Sansuhyeon

review13.content: My child rushes through bath and Korean lessons just to play GemGem400 - they eagerly wait for this time every night. They enjoy it so much!
review13.author: Heeju Kim

title.mobile:

title.pc: "Every child deserves a unique solution"
title.mobile: "Every child deserves a unique solution"

quote.content:
Even with similar difficulties, children may have different causes. 
 Delayed fine motor skills reduce hand use, 
 so personalized movements tailored to each child’s needs maximize rehabilitation.
quote.author: Katie Lee

title.pc: Custom Solution Examples
title.mobile: Custom Solution Examples

description.pc: Though they share the same difficulty in grasping objects, each requires a different treatment approach.
description.mobile: Though they share the same difficulty in grasping objects, each requires a different treatment approach.

leftImage.description:
"The child needs to practice bending their fingers 
 and moving their thumb to touch the fingertips"
leftImage.treatment: Thumb extension / Palm joint flexion / Fist opening

rightImage.description:
"The child practices touching their fingertips by straightening their curved fingers 
 and bending the middle joints of their palms."
rightImage.treatment: Thumb extension / Palm joint flexion / Fist opening

mobile.title: Though they share the same difficulty in grasping objects, each requires a different treatment approach.
mobile.leftDescription:
"The child needs to practice bending their fingers 
 and moving their thumb to touch the fingertips"
mobile.leftTreatmen: Thumb flexion / Palm joint extension / Fist clenching
mobile.rightDescription:
"The child practices touching their fingertips by straightening their curved fingers 
 and bending the middle joints of their palms."
mobile.rightTreatmen: Thumb extension / Palm joint flexion / Fist opening

title.pc:
A fine motor development game, GemGem400,
 created by a rehab mom and a occupational therapist
title.mobile:
A fine motor development game, GemGem400,
 created by a game developer mom and a 17-year occupational therapist

ceo.title:
I made this game after nagging 
 my child to move their hands at home
ceo.description:
My child struggled with periventricular leukomalacia, and we needed a way to continue therapy at home. 
 Existing methods were hard to follow, so I created GemGem400. 
 Now my child enjoys 400+ exercises daily, and the therapy results have improved remarkably.

title.pc: Hand usage frequency is key to recovery
title.mobile: Hand usage frequency is key to recovery

director.description:
With 17 years as an occupational therapist, I found that children with rapid hand function improvement 
had higher 'hand recognition' and 'usage frequency.' 
To aid recovery, neural networks must be stimulated through repetition. 
I strive to develop solutions for enjoyable
